circuitsandbox
Class ComponentFileFilter

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter
      circuitsandbox.ComponentFileFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.FileFilter
public class ComponentFileFilter
extends javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter
implements java.io.FileFilter

Filters out custom component files (*.csc). This filter works with the Swing file chooser and anything else that uses Java's basic FileFilter interface (java.io.FileFilter).

Author:
Daniel Stahl, Kevin Wellwood
